name: levante-translations
description: Levante Translation Dashboard with validation storage

scripts.generate:english: python3 generate_speech.py English "Alexandra - Conversational and Real"
scripts.test:dry-run-all: npm run deploy:levante-dev-dry && npm run deploy:crowdin-dry
scripts.help:
echo "Available commands:
  deploy:levante-dev/prod - Deploy Levante dashboard
  deploy:web - Deploy web dashboard
  deploy:crowdin-dev - Download from Crowdin
  setup:service-account-* - Create Google Cloud service accounts
  generate:english/spanish/german - Generate audio
  fix:csv - Fix CSV formatting
  export:voices - Export voice data
  test:dry-run-all - Test all deployments

Service Account Setup:
  npm run setup:service-account-dev --project_id=YOUR_PROJECT
  npm run setup:service-account-both --project_id=YOUR_PROJECT"
